import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; type LeftBarProps = { totalUnreadEmails?: number; }; const LeftBar = ({ totalUnreadEmails }: LeftBarProps) => { return ( <>
  • Inbox ({totalUnreadEmails})
  • Important
  • Sent
  • Drafts
  • Trash
  • Labels +
  • Dribbble
  • Roommates
  • Bills
  • Chat +
  • Laura Turner
  • Kevin Jones
  • John King
  • Jenny Parker
  • Paul Green
  • {' '} See offline list
); }; export default LeftBar;
